content.arrabic: نوَيْتُ صَوْمَ غَدٍ لِكَفَارَةِ فَرْضًا ِللهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu sauma gadin likafarati fardhon lillâhi ta’âlâ.

translation.id: Saya niat puasa esok hari untuk menunaikan kafarat (dalam hati menyebutkan puasa kafaratnya) fardhu karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to fast tomorrow to fulfill the expiation (mentioning the specific expiatory fast in the heart) as an obligation for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
